function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of contagion between A1 agents","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, potentially leading to an epidemic","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, provide access to testing and vaccines, promote good hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, remote work technologies","People":"A1 agents, A2 agents, A3 agents","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers"},{"Description":"Economic interactions between A1 and A3 agents","Impact":"Potential for transmission of diseases through commercial transactions and labor relationships","Mitigation":"Implement contactless payment methods, promote remote work where possible, provide PPE for in-person interactions","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, remote work technologies, PPE equipment","People":"A1 agents, A3 agents","Owner":"Employers, businesses, government"},{"Description":"Mobility patterns of A1 agents","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of disease due to movement patterns and interactions during work, rest, and leisure hours","Mitigation":"Implement restrictions on movement, promote staggered work hours, provide support for remote work","Technologies":"Location tracking systems, remote work technologies, communication platforms","People":"A1 agents","Owner":"Employers, government"}]}
